title: Build the Future with Your Friend!
text: Studying at IT Time Academy is an investment in the future! Invite a friend and get a 500,000 sum bonus.

div1.text: Reward of 500,000 sum for each friend

info: * Offer valid for a limited time

modal.title: Super Offer!
modal.text: Invite a friend and get a bonus!

action.title: Offer Terms:
action.text1: You must be our student (current or former) for at least 1 month
action.text2: Invite your friend to study at our academy

div1.text: You get 500,000 sum for the next payment or course

div2.text: Your friend gets a 20% discount on studies

modal.info: * Offer valid upon meeting all conditions
